name: HiOperator
headline: Customer support as a service.
description: HiOperator provides customer support as a service. Banish your ticket backlog and free up your in-house team for higher level tasks.

# Elevate Customer Support with Generative AI Solutions
HiOperator's powerful technology personalizes customer support with a suite of automated tools including HiLite, HiAuto, Elite Agent, and more.
[Learn More](http://www.hioperator.com/<#why-hioperator>)[Get Started](http://www.hioperator.com/</contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/621c365a7c7fba3781a56fc1_pexels-olia-danilevich-8145335.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/5fd6348572b2c21c0b2cc0e7_bg-home-tech-ui-kit.svg)
**Our Customer Obsessed Partners**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3da76d35e99761cd4d8_Topgolf.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3daaba53ba1098ef47b_TCGPlayer.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3da54502cbe51eb4059_The_Athletic.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3d9d0eee14fccc625b7_Fabfitfun.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3d94469ff0c248d39b0_nisolo-01.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3da462c3f9c47f4488e_Pax%20Labs.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3d931ad83e49c851ec9_Sunbasket.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3d958c1cd166175afb7_Token%20Transit.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3da14381d7e37ae979a_ebay.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3d954502cbe51eb3feb_Gobble.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3d9c823133d7260c2c8_Zeel.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3da76d35e99761cd496_Outdoorsy.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/6573f3d9462c3f9c47f4485b_Butcher%20Box.png)
**HiOperator Products**
## We Solve Your CS Pain Points
**HiLite:** Understand exactly why customers are writing to your company, and segment them accordingly, with auto-tagged data.‍‍**HiAuto:** Delight customers with quick and automated conversational responses using technology that reduces overhead as well as easily scales for seasonality. ‍‍**Elite Agents:** Count on top-tier senior agents who are fully managed by HiOperator and directly benefit from our technology to service complex customer requests.**SMSBot:** Provide powerful, helpful, and conversational customer support directly to customers SMS. Now you can engage, assist, and delight customers directly on their phones. 
**Customers Win. You Win. We Win.**
## The Intelligent Customer Service Difference
With HiOperator, your company receives a solution that aligns with your goals — from self-service auto-tagging to fully managed Elite Agents. Our technology easily connects to your existing providers — 3PLs, CRMs, Admin, OMS — and our team will have you up and running in days. No APIs? No problem! HiOperator's expert engineers are ready to help and will build a solution that fits your company’s technology stack. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/5fdbaa7562be1ca01d42b63d_train_us%20once_white.png)**Finely Tuned Technology**![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/5fdbac6a90f5fc7c6e10ec5f_send_us_tickets_white.png)**End-to-End Integration**![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/5fdbac56a7f95b5d1f2c1c73_pay_per_ticket_white.png)**Pay-Per-Resolution**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/5fd6348572b2c2fccc2cc00a_image-feature-01-tech-ui-kit.svg)
### Finely Tuned Technology
HiOperator uses workflow automation, refined LLMs, and generative AI to complete the entire customer service journey accurately, effectively, as well as personally. We created the most rigorous _anti-hallucination frameworks_ so our technology stays on brand while solving tickets at the accelerated speed of today's business environment.
### End-to-End Integration
HiOp aggregates all service providers' information, then auto-tagging continually tracks the customer journey, categorizes support issues, and uses this information to reinforce workflows to improve customer service.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/5fd6348572b2c229fd2cc00b_image-feature-02-tech-ui-kit.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/5fd6348572b2c2d07f2cc009_image-feature-03-tech-ui-kit.svg)
### Pay-Per-Resolution
We charge for each conversation we solve. No onboarding fees. No hourly rates. Pay for what you use.
Featured In

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd6348572b2c2c4932cbfc9/6612e78dee17849b3bd7828c_SuperSAT-logo.png)PRESS RELEASE: New SuperSAT Solution Scores Customer Sentiment in Real-Time](http://www.hioperator.com/<http:/www.hioperator.com/blog/supersat-pressrelease>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd6348572b2c2c4932cbfc9/65975e6686b8641221670ab9_download.png)HiOperator unveils QAScout, setting new standards in customer support quality](http://www.hioperator.com/<https:/bit.ly/VBQAScout>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd6348572b2c2c4932cbfc9/65975e6686b8641221670ab9_download.png)How to create generative AI confidence for enterprise success](http://www.hioperator.com/<https:/bit.ly/HiOpEnterpriseAIVentureBeat>)
## Transform Your Customer Service
We can onboard in a matter of days and we offer highly flexible contracts. Whether you need a large team to handle your support or some overflow assistance, getting started is easy.
[Learn about HiOperator](http://www.hioperator.com/</aboutus>)[Chat With Our Team](http://www.hioperator.com/</contact>)
HiOperator rapidly onboards fast and offers highly flexible contracts. Before you know it, our technology will augment your entire workflow — creating happy agents and satisfied customers. 
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5fd63485e589faf92a0e5a3e/5fd64acac2fe792a091f403f_logo-light%402x.png)](http://www.hioperator.com/</old-home>)
### Want to learn more?
Send us an email and we'll be in touch ASAP!
Thank you! We'll be in touch.

generated_description:
HiOperator is a customer support as a service company based in San Francisco, part of the illustrious Y Combinator Batch S16. Founded with a mission to eliminate ticket backlogs, HiOperator empowers in-house teams to focus on higher-level tasks while ensuring efficient and effective customer service.

With a growing team of around 200 employees, HiOperator leverages powerful technology to enhance customer support operations through a variety of automated tools—most notably HiLite, HiAuto, Elite Agent, and SMSbot. These tools are designed to streamline, personalize, and elevate the customer experience, helping clients manage their support efficiently. Features include auto-tagging of customer interactions, quick and automated responses, and even direct SMS support.

What sets HiOperator apart is its flexible and scalable solutions. Companies can integrate HiOperator’s services seamlessly into existing workflows without the need for complicated APIs, and they can choose from flexible contracts based on their needs, whether it’s for overflow assistance or comprehensive support coverage.

The company employs a unique pay-per-resolution pricing model, ensuring that clients only pay for the conversations they solve—no hidden fees or onboarding costs. This approach aligns incentives between HiOperator and its clients, fostering a collaborative atmosphere focused on success.

HiOperator serves a diverse range of industries including retail, media, travel, and health tech, drawing partnerships with notable brands like Shopify, Topgolf, and eBay. Their approach not only aims to solve immediate customer service pain points but also to create a data-driven feedback loop to continuously improve service quality.

For businesses looking to elevate their customer support, HiOperator promises a rapid onboarding process, and their tech-driven solutions can turn customer service challenges into streamlined operations. If you’re intrigued, you can learn more at [hioperator.com](http://www.hioperator.com) or engage further with their offerings.
